column5: Hey All, I was just wondering where i could find some salmon/trout this time of the year? I havent really went much salmon fishing so my knowledge towards this lacks.I was at bronte the beggining of Oct but it was packed with people so i didnt get to fish much any info would be great thank you.

there pretty much done (salmon) but just about any river that had salmon in it will have trout (brown and bows)with the rainbows staying in till around june check the regulations and get a map you will find them and theres nothing better than catching a bunch of chromers from a spot you found and picked yourself.

Haha, Amen to that! aint nothin like it.  well, im not much of a "steelheader" but i got some fantastic spots in the creeks for quality specks. Thats because no one else bothers to go as far up as i do!.... which is where a pond lays... anyways ya salmon are pretty well over, however there are the odd zombies and i'll get out for some chrome eventually.....   JP
ctually the cohos arent yet done and they are runs yet to come
well, here that? theres still coho to come! lol my bad....  i like your picture there too swordfish... habs do suck!
Some ho's are definitely still around and yes I have caught fresh nooks in December but for the most part they are done but then again this has been a weird year weather wise so ya never know
